card.name: Happiness Bell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your shields face down. ■ At the Step#Step 2 (Draw)

card.name: Father Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Jojojo Jokers
card.text: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a Jokers creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Bainaradoor
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

card.name: Yattareman
card.text: ■ Your Jokers cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Clorts, Strange Stone
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Life Wing's Judgment
card.text: ■ Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields Face Up

card.name: One Eye's Judgment
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields Face Up

card.name: Hayateno Sabato
card.text: ■ Each turn, you may have the first spell you cast cost 1 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Mixel, Strange Stone/Jamming Chaff
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature that costs more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone, your opponent puts it on the bottom of their deck. ========================= ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Gunba Great/Gagun Gun Gagun
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ========================= ■ Put a Jokers card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Shiny, Dragon Armored/Edge Spark
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card for each of your opponent's tapped creatures. ========================= ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Hayabusano Sabato Zett/Hirin Mascaras
card.text: ■ Sabaki Z ■ Blocker ========================= ■ Draw a card, then add a card from your hand to your shields face down.

card.name: Django Nyanz
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ Jokers Change ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, one of your creatures gets +5000 power and breaks an additional shield until the End Step

card.name: Tentaikansokun
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone, one on the bottom of your deck and one on the top of your deck.

card.name: Tyke Tysons
card.text: ■ Jokers Change ■ When this creature leaves, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Nirvana
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Icon

card.name: Heaven Gate's Judgment
card.text: ■ Draw a card. Then you may put a creature that has "Blocker" from your hand into the battle zone. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields Face Up
